00037 #if 1
00038     MEM_SmartPtr<BSP_TMesh> 
00039 NewTestMesh(
00040     int x,
00041     int y,
00042     MT_Scalar fx,
00043     MT_Scalar fy,
00044     MT_Scalar ampx,
00045     MT_Scalar ampy,
00046     MT_Scalar sx,
00047     MT_Scalar sy
00048 ) {
00049 
00050     MEM_SmartPtr<BSP_TMesh> output = new BSP_TMesh;
00051 
00052     std::vector<BSP_TVertex> &verts = output->VertexSet();
00053 
00054     int i,j;
00055 
00056     MT_Scalar x_scale = fx*MT_PI/x;
00057     MT_Scalar y_scale = fy*MT_PI/y;
00058 
00059     MT_Scalar fsx = sx/x;
00060     MT_Scalar fsy = sy/y;
00061 
00062     for (j = 0; j < y; j++) {
00063         for (i = 0; i < x; i++) {
00064             float z = ampx*sin(x_scale * i) + ampy*sin(y_scale * j);
00065 
00066             MT_Vector3 val(i*fsx - sx/2,j*fsy - sy/2,z);
00067 
00068             BSP_TVertex chuff;
00069             chuff.m_pos = val;
00070             verts.push_back(chuff);
00071         }
00072     }
00073 
00074     int poly[4];
00075 
00076     for (j = 0; j < (y-1); j++) {
00077         for (i = 0; i < (x-1); i++) {
00078 
00079             poly[0] = j*x + i;
00080             poly[1] = poly[0] + 1;
00081             poly[2] = poly[1] + y;
00082             poly[3] = poly[2] -1;
00083 
00084             output->AddFace(poly,4);
00085         }
00086     }
00087 
00088     output->m_min = MT_Vector3(-sx/2,-sy/2,-ampx -ampy);
00089     output->m_max = MT_Vector3(sx/2,sy/2,ampx + ampy);
00090 
00091     return output;
00092 }
00093 #endif
